rules.natural: If the region has an outbreak of the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.
Either the region has an outbreak of the disease or the region declares a state of emergency for the disease.
Should the region activate the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region implements a lockdown to control the disease.
When the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region does not implement a lockdown to control the disease.

Given that the region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs, then if the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, the region deploys specialized tools and resources.

If it is not the case that declaring a state of emergency for the disease leads to the region successfully containing the disease threat, then the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform.

facts.natural: The region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs.
The region does not deploy specialized tools and resources.

target.natural: The region successfully contains the disease threat.

steps.natural: The region does not activate the emergency response protocol on the platform.
If the region declares a state of emergency for the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.
The region successfully contains the disease threat.
Provided that the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region deploys specialized tools and resources.
The region does not activate the emergency response protocol on the platform.
If the region declares a state of emergency for the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.
The region successfully contains the disease threat.

natural_facts.A1: The region has an outbreak of the disease.
natural_facts.A2: The region declares a state of emergency for the disease.
natural_facts.A3: The region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform.
natural_facts.A4: The region implements a lockdown to control the disease.
natural_facts.A5: The region deploys specialized tools and resources.
natural_facts.A6: The region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs.
natural_facts.G: The region successfully contains the disease threat.

natural_expressions: If the region has an outbreak of the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.
Either the region has an outbreak of the disease or the region declares a state of emergency for the disease.
If the region declares a state of emergency for the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.
Should the region activate the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region implements a lockdown to control the disease.
Provided that the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region deploys specialized tools and resources.
When the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region does not implement a lockdown to control the disease.

Given that the region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs, then if the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, the region deploys specialized tools and resources.

If it is not the case that declaring a state of emergency for the disease leads to the region successfully containing the disease threat, then the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform.
The region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs.
The region successfully contains the disease threat.
The region does not activate the emergency response protocol on the platform.
The region does not deploy specialized tools and resources.

(A1 → G).natural: If the region has an outbreak of the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the region has an outbreak of the disease or the region declares a state of emergency for the disease.

(A2 → G).natural: If the region declares a state of emergency for the disease, then the region successfully contains the disease threat.

(A3 → A4).natural: Should the region activate the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region implements a lockdown to control the disease.

(A3 → A5).natural: Provided that the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region deploys specialized tools and resources.

(A3 → ¬A4).natural: When the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, then the region does not implement a lockdown to control the disease.

(A6 → (A3 → A5)).natural: Given that the region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs, then if the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform, the region deploys specialized tools and resources.

(¬(A2 → G) → A3).natural: If it is not the case that declaring a state of emergency for the disease leads to the region successfully containing the disease threat, then the region activates the emergency response protocol on the platform.

A6.natural: The region receives approval from health authorities for containment jobs.

G.natural: The region successfully contains the disease threat.

¬A3.natural: The region does not activate the emergency response protocol on the platform.

¬A5.natural: The region does not deploy specialized tools and resources.
